lang.description: User's preferred language. Automatically inferred from the user's message. If not detected, defaults to 'en'.

type.description: The type of content to retrieve. 'profile': personal info like age, name, birthplace. 'projects': personal projects Marcel has worked on. 'jobs': employment history, positions, companies. 'certifications': certificates, professional qualifications. 'education': schools, degrees, educational background. 'social_links': social media profiles or other external links.
